languages.text: {n}Ваше утро началось с многочасового пространного доклада Высокого фактотума о последних торговых обменах, сделках, тяжбах и неисчислимых бюрократических процедурах. Из-за плотно закрытых окон, озаренных светом, звучат приглушенные звуки обычной жизни Даргонуса — жизни, которая в последнее время проходила мимо вас, с утра до вечера занято{mf|го|й} делами протектората.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваше утро началось с многочасового пространного доклада Высокого Фактотума о последних торговых обменах, сделках, тяжбах и неисчислимых бюрократических процедурах. Из-за плотно закрытых окон, озаренных светом, звучат приглушенные звуки обычной жизни Даргонуса — жизни, которая в последнее время проходила мимо вас, с утра до вечера занятого делами протектората.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше утро началось с многочасового пространного доклада Высокого фактотума о последних торговых обменах, сделках, тяжбах и неисчислимых бюрократических процедурах. Из-за плотно закрытых окон, озаренных светом, звучат приглушенные звуки обычной жизни Даргонуса — жизни, которая в последнее время проходила мимо вас, с утра до вечера занято{mf|го|й} делами протектората.{/n}

{n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Depuis le début de la matinée, vous écoutez l'interminable rapport du haut factotum sur les derniers échanges commerciaux, les accords, les litiges et les innombrables procédures bureaucratiques. À l'extérieur des baies vitrées lumineuses et hermétiquement closes, vous entendez les bruits étouffés de la vie quotidienne sur Dargonus. Cette vie qui vous échappe ces derniers temps, tant les affaires de votre protectorat vous préoccupent du matin au soir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Depuis le début de la matinée, vous écoutez l'interminable rapport du haut factotum sur les derniers échanges commerciaux, les accords, les litiges et les innombrables procédures bureaucratiques. À l'extérieur des fenêtres lumineuses et hermétiquement closes, vous entendez les bruits étouffés de la vie quotidienne sur Dargonus. Cette vie qui vous échappe ces derniers temps, tant les affaires de votre protectorat vous préoccupent du matin au soir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你一早起来，便花了好几个小时聆听高阶顾问的冗长报告，关于各种各样的贸易、交流、安排、争端，以及没完没了的官僚程序。阳光射进了紧闭的窗户，达戈努斯日常生活的喧嚣传入了你的耳中。你最近从早到晚一直都在忙于王朝事务，甚至都没有时间享受生活。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你一早起来，便花了好几个小时聆听高阶顾问的冗长报告，关于各种各样的贸易、交流、安排、争端，以及没完没了的官僚程序。阳光射进了紧闭的窗户，达戈努斯日常生活的喧嚣传入了你的耳中。你最近从早到晚一直都在忙于王朝事务，甚至都没有时间享受生活。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは朝から数時間、ハイ・ファクトタムによる最新の貿易取引、取り決め、紛争、さらには数え切れないほどの官僚的手続きに関する長い報告に耳を傾けていた。照らされて固く閉ざされた窓の外からは、ダルゴナスの日常の喧騒がくぐもった音となって聞こえてくる。それは朝から晩まで保護領のことに気を取られていたあなたにとっては、しばらく味わえていなかったものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは朝から数時間、ハイ・ファクトタムによる最新の貿易取引、取り決め、紛争、さらには数え切れないほどの官僚的手続きに関する長い報告に耳を傾けていた。照らされて固く閉ざされた窓の外からは、ダルゴナスの日常の喧騒がくぐもった音となって聞こえてくる。それは朝から晩まで保護領のことに気を取られていたあなたにとっては、しばらく味わえていなかったものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast die ersten Stunden des Morgens damit verbracht, dir den ausführlichen Bericht des Hoch-Faktotums über die neuesten Handelsbeziehungen, Vereinbarungen, Streitigkeiten und unzähligen bürokratischen Verfahren anzuhören. Außerhalb der beleuchteten, fest verschlossenen Fenster hörst du gedämpfte Geräusche, die vom Alltag auf Dargonus kommen. Dein Leben ist in letzter Zeit regelrecht an dir vorbeigezogen, weil du dich von morgens bis abends mit den Angelegenheiten deines Protektorats beschäftigen musstest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du verbrachtest die ersten Stunden des Morgens damit, dir den ausführlichen Bericht des Hoch-Faktotums über die neuesten Handelsbeziehungen, Vereinbarungen, Streitigkeiten und unzähligen bürokratischen Verfahren anzuhören. Außerhalb der beleuchteten, fest verschlossenen Fenster hörst du gedämpfte Geräusche, die vom Alltag auf Dargonus kommen. Dein Leben ist in letzter Zeit regelrecht an dir vorbeigezogen, weil du dich von morgens bis abends mit den Angelegenheiten deines Protektorats beschäftigen musstest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has pasado las primeras horas de la mañana escuchando el extenso informe del sumo factótum sobre las más recientes transacciones comerciales, acuerdos, disputas e innumerables procedimientos burocráticos. Al otro lado de las ventanas iluminadas, cerradas a cal y canto, se oyen los sonidos apagados de Dargonus y su vida cotidiana. La vida que últimamente te ha pasado de largo, pues has estado muy {mf|atareado|atareada} gestionando tu protectorado desde el alba hasta el anochecer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasas las primeras horas de la mañana escuchando el extenso informe del sumo factótum sobre las más recientes transacciones comerciales, acuerdos, disputas e innumerables procedimientos burocráticos. Al otro lado de las ventanas iluminadas, cerradas a cal y canto, se oyen los sonidos apagados de Dargonus y su vida cotidiana. La vida que últimamente te ha pasado de largo, pues has estado muy {mf|atareado|atareada} gestionando tu protectorado desde el alba hasta el anochecer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabahın ilk saatlerini Arşıkâhya'nın güncel hisse değerleri, düzenlemeler, çekişmeler ve sayısız bürokratik prosedür hakkındaki uzun raporunu dinleyerek geçirdin. Sıkı sıkı kapatılmış, aydınlık pencerelerin ötesinden Dargonus'un gündelik yaşantısının boğuk seslerini duyabiliyorsun. Son zamanlarda gece gündüz protektora meseleleriyle meşgul olduğundan bu hayatı tamamen es geçtin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have spent the first few hours of your morning listening to the High Factotum's lengthy report on the latest trade exchanges, arrangements, disputes, and countless bureaucratic procedures. From outside the illuminated, tightly closed windows, you can hear the muffled sounds of Dargonus and its everyday life — the life that has been passing you by lately, as you have been preoccupied with the affairs of your protectorate from dawn till dusk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabahın ilk saatlerini Arşıkâhya'nın güncel hisse değerleri, düzenlemeler, çekişmeler ve sayısız bürokratik prosedür hakkındaki uzun raporunu dinleyerek geçirdin. Sıkı sıkı kapatılmış aydınlık pencerelerin dışında Dargonus'un günlük hayatının boğuk boğuk gelen sesini duyabiliyorsun. Son zamanlarda gece gündüz protektora meseleleriyle meşgul olduğun için tamamen es geçtiğin hayatın sesini.{/n}
